page.title: 19Youth Club
page.content: Youth club is held every Monday 7pm to 9.30pm at the village hall.The last two weeks there has been a chance for fourth year leavers to go free.I went both nights and I think it is very good.There is a table tennis set,snooker tables and an Atari.Plus music!I like playing table tennis best because i am good at tennis and it gives me practice.The youth club is open all the year but for school holidays.On the last one before it closes for the Summer holidays or Christmas they have a special treat like a barbecue or Christmas dinner.I went to the barbecue and it was very good.You could have hamburgers or hot dogs or even a jacket potato or a pot of beans.At Christmas I expect it will be just as good.I enjoyed it a lot and next year when it starts up again I shall join.
